title: Pixel availability
content: Last year I want to purchase Google pixel 4xl in india then I get to know that pixel4xl will not be coming to India so I be like wait for another year pixel 5 will come then pixel5 also not coming to India so now I decided to buy pixel 5 from canada and bring it to India so my question is will the pixel 5 will work in india as intended in the countries which has its availablity and will it receive the updates for 3 years in india too despite that india doesn't have its availablity?
